title: Crossbow stock

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Crossbow stock is the wooden centre of a crossbow. It is required to make a crossbow. They can be fletched by members who have the necessary Fletching level. They can also be purchased or stolen from the crossbow stall in Keldagrim.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Crossbow stock

A Crossbow stock is the wooden centre of a crossbow. It is required to make a crossbow. They can be fletched by members who have the necessary Fletching level. They can also be purchased or stolen from the crossbow stall in Keldagrim.

Fletching table[edit | edit source]

Level Item Material XP
9 Wooden stock 6
24 Oak stock 16
39 Willow stock 22
46 Teak stock 27
54 Maple stock 32
61 Mahogany stock 41
69 Yew stock 50
78 Magic stock 70
